features: Cool designed 1:18 All Terrain RC Truck.Equipped with powerful motors,the speed of RC car can reach 20km/h,making more competitive in racing.

The RC car is made of durable material,which has strong toughness and can be bent but not easily deformed.With metal shell,anti-skid tires and shock absorbers,you can easily race the car on grass,rocks,concrete roads and other terrains.Provide lots of fun for you and your kids.
The Remote Control Car comes with 2 high-quality Rechargeable Batteries which can provide up to 30-40 mins play time once.Kids can enjoy the RC fun for long time.

This RC monster truck is equipped with a 2.4GHz Smart Remote Control which has good anti-interference performance and stable signal transmission.The RC truck will not receive any interference when you race with other vehicles.

Whether the new to RC Car or advanced RC car lover,this All Terrain RC truck can provide fast speed,easy control,and long time playing.Your kids will be excited when reciving the RC Car as a Christmas or Birthday gift.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2024
Reviewed in the United States on November 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good value for a small, basic, entry level car
reviews.reviewText: I want to start by saying this car is not meant by any means for a full blown R/C enthusiast. It’s for small kids to get some fun out of it and then maybe graduate up to a better one that offers more features on a leveled up vehicle. This is a very basic car. It has great suspension but it’s not really needed because the motor, torque and overall weight of this car don’t get to put it to any real use. The car is like an old Prius, needs a long time and space to speed up. It’s turning radius also leave a lot to be desired, but like I said, this is very entry level fun only. I laughed when I read some other reviews, I mean what do you think you were getting at this price point? A high tech, fast, very maneuverable car? This is a toy, not a pro racer. I like it and I hope those who order it understand what they are getting before jumping on the criticism.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 19, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Thing zooms! Doesn’t work on medium to tall grass but short grass, dirt, sand, and concrete it works great on! I don’t have kids but I take it to the dog park to tire out my puppy, while I sit and relax! Works like a charm, it’s his favorite toy!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Save your money
reviews.reviewText: First off, it definitely can not go "EVERYWHERE". My nephew had to go and free the thing each time it went into the grass. Which is sad bc I got so he could drive it in the snow and mud which it advertises, but it definitely can not. The turning radius is terrible, even if you get it for indoor use.... good luck. Its 3+ point turns no matter what. Looks great, good quality material for crashing. But definitely not worth it for other RCs for can get for $20.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Kids Love this!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars It has 2 rechargeable batteries.
reviews.reviewText: This remote controlled car is great for beginners it's quick but too fast. It has 2 rechargeable batteries so you'll never be down waiting on a battery to charge. It has cool lights, big tires and is a lot of fun to drive.It is worth the money.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewText: The car seems to be very well made. It doesn't have that cheap feel that you sometimes come across RC cars. It comes with 2 rechargeable batteries which automatically increases the fun factor of the car. The batteries recharge via the included USB charger. I also like the remote control with how the front wheels are controlled with a steering wheel instead of a joy stick setup. The 2 required batteries for the remote are not included with the purchase but that's a small price to pay for the fun you'll have. Overall I would definitely recommend the product for a birthday or Christmas gift for anyone from child to adult.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Looks Great, Drives Just Okay
reviews.reviewText: This is a really nice looking RC car, the metal plates and rubber tires make for a cool looking car.This car comes with two batteries that were charged and ready to go!The car tracks well and can get up to a moderately fast speed as you control turning and acceleration.However once I fired it up I realize this rig leaves a lot to be desired.Main issues are slow start up speed and big (I mean big) turning radius.I takes this car quite a few feet to get up to speed, the slow start and torque make it difficult if not impossible to navigate an obstacle from the start.The turning radius is terrible and takes a lot of space (the controller steering only turns a little bit).If you just want a cool little car to cruise up and down the driveway this might work fine but the slow start is really a deal breaker for me.
